If you're a freelance video editor, I have a role for you üéûÔ∏èüëá This is a super fun job for someone who's keen to flex their creativity. You'll be working on YouTube videos, shorts, and editing new course trailers. Deadline 22nd Oct, 11pm BST. Apply here: https://lnkd.in/ejKzHZDY

Like Comment

Transcript

Hey Frank, how's it going? We are looking for a video editor to join the team. Our goal overall is to try and create some of the best personal development videos and content in the world and the whole idea behind our mission is to try and help people build a like they love. So if you are interested in potentially joining us as a video editor, we need someone who's absolutely sick and this is a remote contractor role that is available to anyone anywhere in the world. We do not care who you are or where you are, we just care that you are a fantastic video editor. If that sounds like you then please check out the information on this page. Click the link down below wherever you're seeing this and. Do please apply. We would love to hear from you.
